properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 12 at 3:20PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Travel will be very
difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 4
inches are expected.

* WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 50 mph will cause
whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the
snow is likely. Snow developing this evening will cause low
visibility to develop. The worst conditions are expected from
late tonight through Monday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY
